name: Noom Weight Loss Program
what_you_do: Digital health platform that uses AI, human coaches, and behavioral science-based content developed by psychologists to help users change eating habits and lose weight long-term.
who_you_serve: Consumers seeking weight loss and healthy habit formation, including those burned by failed diets.
social_proof: $3.7 billion valuation, disrupted the $450 billion U.S. wellness market, book published by Simon & Schuster
signature_programs: Noom Weight Loss App, Noom Mood (stress and anxiety management app), The Noom Mindset: Learn the Science, Lose the Weight (book)
business_focus: Leveraging AI, certified coaches, and psychology-based content to deliver a scalable behavioral change platform focused on weight management and overall wellness.
service_provided: AI-powered weight loss app, certified health coaching, behavioral science-based content delivery, stress and anxiety management app
